trans-unit.source: Represents the lengths of elements within the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa os comprimentos dos elementos dentro do controle de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" />.

trans-unit.source: The absolute pixel value (96 pixels-per-inch) to initialize the length to.
trans-unit.target: O valor absoluto de pixel (96 pixels por polegada) para o qual inicializar o comprimento.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> class with an absolute value in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> com um valor absoluto em pixels.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="pixels" /> is <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />, <see cref="F:System.Double.NegativeInfinity" />, or <see cref="F:System.Double.PositiveInfinity" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="pixels" /> é <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />, <see cref="F:System.Double.NegativeInfinity" /> ou <see cref="F:System.Double.PositiveInfinity" />.

trans-unit.source: The requested size of the element.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho solicitado do elemento.

trans-unit.source: The type that is used to determine how the size of the element is calculated.
trans-unit.target: O tipo usado para determinar como o tamanho do elemento é calculado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> class with a specified value and unit.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> com um valor e uma unidade especificados.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />, <see cref="F:System.Double.NegativeInfinity" />, or <see cref="F:System.Double.PositiveInfinity" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> é <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />, <see cref="F:System.Double.NegativeInfinity" /> ou <see cref="F:System.Double.PositiveInfinity" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="type" /> is not <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLengthUnitType.Auto" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLengthUnitType.Pixel" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLengthUnitType.Star" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLengthUnitType.SizeToCells" />, or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLengthUnitType.SizeToHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="type" /> não é <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLengthUnitType.Auto" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLengthUnitType.Pixel" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLengthUnitType.Star" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLengthUnitType.SizeToCells" /> ou <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLengthUnitType.SizeToHeader" />.

trans-unit.source: The requested size of the element.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho solicitado do elemento.

trans-unit.source: The type that is used to determine how the size of the element is calculated.
trans-unit.target: O tipo usado para determinar como o tamanho do elemento é calculado.

trans-unit.source: The calculated size needed for the element.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho calculado necessário para o elemento.

trans-unit.source: The allocated size for the element.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho alocado para o elemento.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> class with the specified value, unit, desired value, and display value.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> com o valor, a unidade, o valor desejado e o valor de exibição especificados.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />, <see cref="F:System.Double.NegativeInfinity" />, or <see cref="F:System.Double.PositiveInfinity" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> é <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />, <see cref="F:System.Double.NegativeInfinity" /> ou <see cref="F:System.Double.PositiveInfinity" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="type" /> is not <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLengthUnitType.Auto" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLengthUnitType.Pixel" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLengthUnitType.Star" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLengthUnitType.SizeToCells" />, or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLengthUnitType.SizeToHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="type" /> não é <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLengthUnitType.Auto" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLengthUnitType.Pixel" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLengthUnitType.Star" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLengthUnitType.SizeToCells" /> ou <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLengthUnitType.SizeToHeader" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="desiredValue" /> is <see cref="F:System.Double.NegativeInfinity" /> or <see cref="F:System.Double.PositiveInfinity" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="desiredValue" /> é <see cref="F:System.Double.NegativeInfinity" /> ou <see cref="F:System.Double.PositiveInfinity" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="displayValue" /> is <see cref="F:System.Double.NegativeInfinity" /> or <see cref="F:System.Double.PositiveInfinity" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="displayValue" /> é <see cref="F:System.Double.NegativeInfinity" /> ou <see cref="F:System.Double.PositiveInfinity" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> structure that represents the standard automatic sizing mode.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> que representa o modo de dimensionamento automático padrão.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> structure that represents the standard automatic sizing mode.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> estrutura que representa o modo de dimensionamento automático padrão.

trans-unit.source: The standard automatic sizing mode sizes <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> columns based on the contents of both cells and column headers.
trans-unit.target: O padrão automático tamanhos de modo de dimensionamento <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> colunas com base no conteúdo das células e cabeçalhos de coluna.

trans-unit.source: Gets the calculated pixel value needed for the element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor de pixel calculado necessário para o elemento.

trans-unit.source: The number of pixels calculated for the size of the element.
trans-unit.target: O número de pixels calculado para o tamanho do elemento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the pixel value allocated for the size of the element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor de pixel alocado para o tamanho do elemento.

trans-unit.source: The number of pixels allocated for the element.
trans-unit.target: O número de pixels alocado para o elemento.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an object is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" />.
trans-unit.target: Determina se um objeto é igual ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: The object to compare to the current instance.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser comparado com a instância atual.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" />.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o objeto especificado é igual ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified object is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> with the same value or sizing mode as the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o objeto especificado for um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> com o mesmo valor ou o modo de dimensionamento que o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> atual, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> to compare to the current instance.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> a ser comparado com a instância atual.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" />.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> especificado é igual ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified object is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> with the same value or sizing mode as the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o objeto especificado for um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> com o mesmo valor ou o modo de dimensionamento que o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> atual, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a hash code for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o código hash para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" />.

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" />.
trans-unit.target: Um código hash do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this instance sizes elements based on a fixed pixel value.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se estes elementos de tamanhos de instância baseiam-se em um valor de pixel fixo.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength.UnitType" /> property is set to <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLengthUnitType.Pixel" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength.UnitType" /> estiver definida como <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLengthUnitType.Pixel" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this instance automatically sizes elements based on both the content of cells and the column headers.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se esta instância dimensiona automaticamente os elementos com base no conteúdo das células e nos cabeçalhos de coluna.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength.UnitType" /> property is set to <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLengthUnitType.Auto" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength.UnitType" /> estiver definida como <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLengthUnitType.Auto" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this instance automatically sizes elements based on the content of the cells.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se esta instância dimensiona automaticamente os elementos com base no conteúdo das células.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength.UnitType" /> property is set to <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLengthUnitType.SizeToCells" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength.UnitType" /> estiver definida como <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLengthUnitType.SizeToCells" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this instance automatically sizes elements based on the header.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se esta instância dimensiona automaticamente os elementos com base no cabeçalho.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength.UnitType" /> property is set to <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLengthUnitType.SizeToHeader" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength.UnitType" /> estiver definida como <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLengthUnitType.SizeToHeader" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this instance automatically sizes elements based on a weighted proportion of available space.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se esta instância dimensiona automaticamente os elementos com base em uma proporção ponderada de espaço disponível.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength.UnitType" /> property is set to <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLengthUnitType.Star" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength.UnitType" /> estiver definida como <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLengthUnitType.Star" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> instance to compare.
trans-unit.target: A primeira instância <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> a ser comparada.

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> instance to compare.
trans-unit.target: A segunda instância <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> a ser comparada.

trans-unit.source: Compares two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> structures for equality.
trans-unit.target: Compara a igualdade de duas estruturas <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> instances have the same value or sizing mode; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se as duas instâncias <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> tiverem o mesmo valor ou modo de dimensionamento, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The absolute pixel value (96 pixels-per-inch) to initialize the length to.
trans-unit.target: O valor absoluto de pixel (96 pixels por polegada) para o qual inicializar o comprimento.

trans-unit.source: Converts a <see cref="T:System.Double" /> to an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Converte um <see cref="T:System.Double" /> em uma instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" />.

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the specified length.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que representa o comprimento especificado.

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> instance to compare.
trans-unit.target: A primeira instância <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> a ser comparada.

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> instance to compare.
trans-unit.target: A segunda instância <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> a ser comparada.

trans-unit.source: Compares two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> structures to determine whether they are not equal.
trans-unit.target: Compara duas estruturas <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> para determinar se elas não são iguais.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> instances do not have the same value or sizing mode; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se as duas instâncias de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> não tiverem o mesmo valor ou modo de dimensionamento; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> structure that represents the cell-based automatic sizing mode.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> que representa o modo de dimensionamento automático baseado em célula.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> structure that represents the cell-based automatic sizing mode.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> que representa o modo de dimensionamento automático baseado em célula.

trans-unit.source: The cell-based automatic sizing mode sizes <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> columns based on the contents of cells in the column, not including column headers.
trans-unit.target: Baseado em célula automático tamanhos de modo de dimensionamento <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> colunas com base no conteúdo das células na coluna, não incluindo os cabeçalhos de coluna.

trans-unit.source: This sizing mode will cause columns to expand if content that is larger than the current column size is scrolled into view.
trans-unit.target: Este modo de dimensionamento fará com que colunas a serem expandidas se conteúdo que é maior do que o tamanho atual da coluna é colocado na exibição.

trans-unit.source: The column will not shrink after the content is scrolled out of view.
trans-unit.target: A coluna não será reduzida depois que o conteúdo estiver fora da exibição.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> structure that represents the header-based automatic sizing mode.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> que representa o modo de dimensionamento automático baseado em cabeçalho.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> structure that represents the header-based automatic sizing mode.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> que representa o modo de dimensionamento automático baseado em cabeçalho.

trans-unit.source: The header-based automatic sizing mode sizes <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> columns based on the contents of column headers only.
trans-unit.target: O automático com base no cabeçalho de tamanhos de modo de dimensionamento <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> colunas com base no conteúdo de apenas os cabeçalhos de coluna.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the current object.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma cadeia de caracteres que representa o objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: A string that represent the current object.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que representa o objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type that is used to determine how the size of the element is calculated.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo que é usado para determinar como o tamanho do elemento é calculado.

trans-unit.source: A type that represents how size is determined.
trans-unit.target: Um tipo que representa como o tamanho é determinado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the absolute value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor absoluto do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> em pixels.

trans-unit.source: The absolute value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> in pixels, or 1.0 if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength.UnitType" /> property is set to <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLengthUnitType.Auto" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor absoluto do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength" /> em pixels ou 1.0, caso o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength.UnitType" /> está definida como <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLengthUnitType.Auto" />.
